tags: I'm the one who wants to be buried rn
summary:
Harry: I’m...grounded?
James: Yes, you’re grounded!
Lily: You disobeyed an order.
James: And now we’re gonna bury you until...
body:
Harry: I’m...grounded?
James: Yes, you’re grounded!
Lily: You disobeyed an order.
James: And now we’re gonna bury you until you’ve learned your lesson!
Lily: Dear, that’s not how grounding works.

dialogue.name: James
dialogue.label: James:
dialogue.phrase: And now we’re gonna bury you until you’ve learned your lesson!

dialogue.name: Lily
dialogue.label: Lily:
dialogue.phrase: Dear, that’s not how grounding works.

summary: When Chamber of Secrets finished showing at the cinema, the owners let me keep the life size Harry Potter promotional cut out....
body:
When Chamber of Secrets finished showing at the cinema, the owners let me keep the life size Harry Potter promotional cut out. Then when I was 21 and moving overseas I sold it because I didn’t ever think that I would be back. 

Well, I came back and now getting rid of that cut out is probably my biggest life regret.

reblog.comment:
When Chamber of Secrets finished showing at the cinema, the owners let me keep the life size Harry Potter promotional cut out. Then when I was 21 and moving overseas I sold it because I didn’t ever think that I would be back. 

Well, I came back and now getting rid of that cut out is probably my biggest life regret.

Well, I came back and now getting rid of that cut out is probably my biggest life regret.

blog.name: benedettabeby
blog.title: What comes to my mind
blog.description: "All's fair in love and war," said Ron brightly, "and this is a bit of both."

summary: "How come you're here?" Apparently Ron had hoped that this point would come up later, if at all. "Well, I've -- you know -- I've...
body:
“How come you’re here?” Apparently Ron had hoped that this point would come up later, if at all. “Well, I’ve – you know – I’ve come back. If –” He cleared his throat. “You know. You still want me.”
THIS. KILLS. ME. MY. BABY.

reblog.comment:
“How come you’re here?” Apparently Ron had hoped that this point would come up later, if at all. “Well, I’ve – you know – I’ve come back. If –” He cleared his throat. “You know. You still want me.”
THIS. KILLS. ME. MY. BABY.

trail.content_raw:
“How come you’re here?” Apparently Ron had hoped that this point would come up later, if at all. “Well, I’ve – you know – I’ve come back. If –” He cleared his throat. “You know. You still want me.”
THIS. KILLS. ME. MY. BABY.
trail.content:
“How come you’re here?” Apparently Ron had hoped that this point would come up later, if at all. “Well, I’ve – you know – I’ve come back. If –” He cleared his throat. “You know. You still want me.”
THIS. KILLS. ME. MY. BABY.

summary: say love and death in the same breath (I dare you)
title: say love and death in the same breath (I dare you)
body:
by fyeri

Older, wiser and infinitely more jaded, the famed Harry Potter returns once again to Hogwarts, School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, after 21 years. He’s hoping for one last wild adventure that he never got in his seventh year, and as usual, Hogwarts doesn’t disappoint.

Lovesick teens, brooding werewolves, life-threatening curses and the Triwizard Tournament are just some of the roadblocks on his secret mission to spend more one-on-one quality Daddy time with his kids. Can you blame him?

Words: 9409, Chapters: 1/8, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Teen Wolf (TV), Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Scott McCall (Teen Wolf), Stiles Stilinski, Derek Hale
  • Relationships: Derek Hale/Stiles Stilinski, Allison Argent/Scott McCall, Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley
  • Additional Tags: Crossover, Alpha Derek, Slow Build, Not Harry Potter and the Cursed Child Compliant, Alternate Universe - Hogwarts, Teen Wolf Mechanics, Attempt at Humor, Famous Harry, Mystery, Triwizard Tournament, Omega Scott, Pack Dynamics, Care of Magical Creatures, Pining Derek, Everyone Is Magic

Read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OJmnaG

blog.name: engiedraws
blog.title: Engie Draws
blog.description: Platonic bf of @Hanzaj My interests are all over the place. I'm learning the violin, electric bass, archery, and drawing. I have a skull named Walt and I have to read him poetry every night or else he can't go to sleep. I also have an nfc chip in my hand.

title: Harry Potter Houses as Colleges
body:
Gryffindor: Ivy League reach school

Hufflepuff: The backup state school

Ravenclaw: That liberal arts college in the north east

Slytherin: The school that you only got into because your parents are rich alumni
